h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Cyan Loong - Chapter 3 Dragon Boss
content: As you approach the statue, it will come to life and you'll be thrown into a fight against Cyan Loong. When you've beaten him, a Treasure Chest will appear in the nearby waterfall, which contains Breath of Fire Soak and Mountain-Shaking Core. You'll also unlock the crafting recipe for the mythical Golden Loong Staff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Cyan Loong - Chapter 3 Dragon Boss'.
The content is as follows:
As you approach the statue, it will come to life and you'll be thrown into a fight against Cyan Loong. When you've beaten him, a Treasure Chest will appear in the nearby waterfall, which contains Breath of Fire Soak and Mountain-Shaking Core. You'll also unlock the crafting recipe for the mythical Golden Loong Staff.
